Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity  at Dempster-Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity  at Dempster-Skokie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
